data.eml:eml: A new species of blue-eyed Leptobrachium (Anura: Megophryidae) from Sumatra, Indonesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hamidy, Amir, Matsui, Masafumi (2010): A new species of blue-eyed Leptobrachium (Anura: Megophryidae) from Sumatra, Indonesia. Zootaxa 2395: 34-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193954
